metadata.title: VantumERP - Modern Distribution ERP for Enterprises
metadata.description: Distribution ERP without the legacy baggage. Inventory, Purchasing, Sales, and Replenishment unified in one modern platform. Built by Actaer for enterprises that refuse to compromise on software quality.

hero.description: Inventory, Purchasing, Sales, and Replenishment—unified in one modern platform. Built for enterprises that refuse to compromise on software quality.

modules.title: Four pillars. One unified system.
modules.description: Each module is designed to work independently—but together, they create an operational powerhouse.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Real-time stock visibility across unlimited warehouses and locations. Track every SKU with precision—from receiving to shelf to customer.

sales.title: Sales Orders
sales.description: Quote-to-cash workflow with real-time availability checks. Automatic inventory reservation on order confirmation.

purchasing.title: Purchasing
purchasing.description: Vendor management with purchase order automation. Track lead times, costs, and receiving—all in one place.

replenishment.title: Smart Replenishment
replenishment.description: AI-assisted reorder point calculations. Generate purchase orders automatically based on sales velocity, lead times, and safety stock levels.

whyVantum.title: ERP without the enterprise baggage.
whyVantum.description: Legacy ERPs were built for a different era. We're building for companies that expect software to just work.

pricing.legacy: Per-seat licensing that scales against you
pricing.vantum: Predictable pricing that scales with you

ux.legacy: Decade-old UX with steep learning curves
ux.vantum: Modern interface your team will actually use

whyVantum.quote: We built Vantum because we were tired of explaining why
whyVantum.quoteContinued: enterprise software has to be this painful.

trust.title: Built on foundations you can trust.
trust.description: Security, performance, and reliability aren't features—they're requirements. We've built them into every layer.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Role-based access control, audit logging, and encryption at rest and in transit.

architecture.title: Modern Architecture
architecture.description: Built on .NET 10 and React 19 with event-driven patterns and CQRS.

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Sub-second response times even with millions of transactions.

sovereignty.title: Data Sovereignty
sovereignty.description: Deploy on your infrastructure or our managed cloud. Your data, your rules.

api.title: API Complete
api.description: Every feature available via REST API. Build integrations on your terms.

database.title: PostgreSQL Native
database.description: Battle-tested database with proven reliability and scalability.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your
cta.description: We're accepting a select group of enterprises for our 2026 pilot program. Get early access, priority support, and shape the product roadmap.
cta.noCommitment: No commitment required. We'll reach out within 24 hours.

earlyAccessModal.title: Request Early Access
earlyAccessModal.description: Join our pilot program. We'll be in touch within 24 hours.
earlyAccessModal.successMessage: Thank you for your interest. We'll be in touch soon.

footer.tagline: Distribution ERP for modern enterprises. Built with care.
footer.erpForScale: Enterprise distribution ERP built for scale.
